post_text: December 9, 2017 at 12:24 PM#1hi ma forumi am trying to create a macro that will help me assign a trigger to cue in another sequence by promt quastionsassign executor 1.1 cue (what cue) /cmd=goto executor 2.101 cue (what cue)orassign executor 1.1 cue (what cue) /cmd=macro (macro number?)something like thatdid try using var  but did not go very wellthanks for the help
